attributes.action: Implement the 50+1 rule in English Football so a fan organisation run the club
attributes.additional_details: It would make the fans have a say in how their club is run and protects the fans from billionaires who prioritise profits over the fanbase. It would make games more accessible for the locals and the true, diehard fans and not some tourist on a day trip.
attributes.background: The 50+1 rule would mean that the fans would make decisions on how the club is run and how it functions. For instances, they would control ticket prices, investments in the club, stadium renovations etc.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711368
